title: tracks
description: Specification of race configurations for night-rally

track.description: The name of the Rally track

track-repository.description: The track-repository that contains the track specification

placement.description: Indicates on which target machine(s) to place a benchmark. Should be in the range [0, number_of_target_machines - 1]. 0 means that target hosts are assigned starting from the first target host, 1, starting from the second target host and so on.

name.description: Unique name of the specific benchmark, also used as the name on the chart

label.description: Label to use when displaying charts

items.description: Chart names to plot results on

challenge.description: Name of track's challenge to execute

car.description: Car to use from rally-teams repo

runtime-jdk.description: Runtime jdk to use, overwrites the default

telemetry.description: The telemetry devices to activate for a race

on-error.description: How Rally should behave on request errors
